cause.description:
Annoyed by our planet?
Annoyed by stupid teenagers and college students advocation expensive organic and "green" solutions?
Well, this cause is for you.
All you need to do is take simple steps.
Why not throw your trash on the ground instead of throwing it away?
Why recycle and use subpar recycled products when you can use brand new ones?
Together, we can destroy our planet!
1. Canada's seal hunt must be expanded to all countries.
2. Health care is not a constitutional right.
3. Pollute as much as possible.
cause.mission: turn the earth into a grey, uninhabitable environment.
cause.name: Pollute the Earth!
